subject: Parts are missing ORDER SSN4647
description_text:
Hello, now i am very angry. First it is out of stock and i had to wait after Christmas before they arrived and now you have send half of the order( see picture order.png)

I also orded 

1 × Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback  VAM Pro Set (2 pac/includes power supply) => missing in the parcel
1 X Mounting BracketU-Shaped Mounting Bracket for Brake, U-Shaped Mounting Bracket for Throttle | €6.76 => missing in the parcel



See picture parcel.jpg


So far, everything has gone wrong with this order. I am not thrilled with your service. I hope you will send me the missing parts as quickly as possible and with the highest priority. 
If not i will refund the money from VISA. 
Now it is you turn to solve this Problem

Regards

ZECHES Laurent
